data.title: The Splinter Cell Franchise on PlayStation
data.meta_description: The Splinter Cell Franchise consists of 4 games containing 159 trophies worth a total of 5,220 Trophy XP. View your total score for the franchise here
data.text:
Ubisoft announces Splinter Cell remake in development

Ubisoft has only gone and done it. The French publisher has finally officially announced a Splinter Cell remake that is in development at Ubisoft Toronto. The game will be using the next-gen Snowdrop engine.

Posted 2 years ago by Kes Eylers-Stephenson

A new Splinter Cell game might finally be in development — report

According to a report, Ubisoft has greenlighted a new Splinter Cell game that is currently in early production. The stealth series has been on hiatus for nearly a decade at this point.

Posted 2 years ago by Kes Eylers-Stephenson

New Ubisoft Tom Clancy game will be unveiled later today

Ubisoft has announced that its new Tom Clancy game will be revealed later today. You can see a snippet of gameplay now thanks to IGN and GameSpot’s short gameplay clips.

Posted 3 years ago by Kes Eylers-Stephenson

The Division, Splinter Cell, and Ghost Recon crossover FPS leaks on social media

A multiplayer first-person shooter that features a Splinter Cell, The Division, and Ghost Recon crossover has reportedly leaked online ahead of its official reveal.

Posted 3 years ago by Sean Carey

E3 2018's Lost Games: Seven No-Shows We Hoped to See

So E3 was pretty good. We had all kinds of major hitters coming out and looking really good, but spectators may have noticed that some of the players didn't quite make it onto the field. This is their story.

Posted 6 years ago by Kevin Tavore

What's On Your E3 2018 Wishlist?

For forward-thinking gamers, the next month will probably feel like a drag. The anticipation of E3 can be hard to navigate, like the few weeks before your birthday as a kid. Here's what's keeping us up at night. Share your list!

Posted 6 years ago by Mark Delaney

EU Playstation Store Discounts: July 29th, 2015

Today marks the start of the Summer Sale, with lots of games reduced. Half of these games are on sale now, with the second half going live in two weeks - August 12th. Put down those cocktails, get of

Posted 9 years ago by MunchMagic1986
